lead_paragraph: A senior U.S. House Republican on Tuesday floated a plan to avoid a government shutdown fight in December while also setting a path for undoing sweeping immigration changes President Barack Obama is expected to execute.

headline.main: U.S. House Republican Floats Plan to Defund Immigration Order but Avoid Shutdown
headline.print_headline: U.S. House Republican Floats Plan to Defund Immigration Order but Avoid Shutdown

snippet: A senior U.S. House Republican on Tuesday floated a plan to avoid a government shutdown fight in December while also setting a path for undoing sweeping immigration changes President Barack Obama is expected to execute....
